entry.title: New release - 0.2.0
entry.content:
0.2.0 is here

This version adds functionality to format the output of the TerraformShow method as HTML. This is particularly useful in CI/CD scenarios, as a report to use within a build server such as TeamCity.
entry.summary: This version adds functionality to format the output of the TerraformShow method as HTML. This is particularly useful in CI/CD scenarios, as a report to use within a build server such as TeamCity.

entry.title: Initial Release - 0.1.0
entry.content:
0.1.0 is here

The first prerelease version of Cake.Terraform is available!
entry.summary: The first prerelease version of Cake.Terraform is available!
